title: AnacondaCON
subtitle: Feb 7 - 9 | Austin
summary:
At AnacondaCON, you will engage with foundational contributors and thought leaders in the Open Data Science movement who are harnessing the power and innovation of our community. The agenda will be filled with educational, informative and thought-provoking sessions to ensure you walk away with the knowledge and connections you need to move your Open Data Science initiatives forward.

Follow us at @ContinuumIO and the #AnacondaCON #AnacondaCREW hashtags for updates!

title: PyData Cologne
subtitle: November 28 - 30 | Cologne
summary:
Continuum is the founding sponsor of PyData Conferences, and we’re proud to have a presence at these important open source conferences all over the world. Our team looks forward to seeing our #AnacondaCrew in Germany and talking all things Python, data science and open source.

Follow @ContinuumIO @PyData and the #PyData hashtag for updates!

title: Gartner Symposium/ITxpo
subtitle: Oct 16 - 20 | Orlando
summary:
Come join us in the Emerging Technologies Pavilion & Theater to meet co-founders Travis Oliphant (@teoliphant) and Peter Wang (@pwang), as well as our CMO Michele Chambers (@MCanalytics).

Follow Continuum Analytics on Twitter @ContinuumIO and the #GartnerSYM #AnacondaCrew hashtags to stay up-to-date on all our activity during the conference. See you there!

title: Strata + Hadoop World New York
subtitle: Sep 26 - 29 | New York City
summary:

Follow Continuum Analytics on Twitter @ContinuumIO and the #StrataHadoop #AnacondaCrew hashtags to stay up-to-date on all our activity during the conference. See you there!

title: EuroPython
subtitle: July 17 - 24 | Bilbao
summary:
Bokeh core developer Fabio Pliger will be hosting his talk "OMG, Bokeh is Better Than Ever!" on Thursday, July 21 at 11:15AM at this year's EuroPython Conference. Don't miss it! 

Follow @ContinuumIO @europython and the #EuroPython hashtag for updates!

title: PyGotham
subtitle: July 16 - 17 | New York City
summary: Dask core developer Matt Rocklin will be hosting his talk "Distributed Python with Dask" at this year's PyGotham Conference.

title: MIT CDOIQ Symposium
subtitle: July 12 - 14 | Cambridge
summary:
CTO and Co-Founder Peter Wang will present 'The ‘D’ in CDO Stands for Disruption, not Data' at the MIT CDOIQ Symposium on Wednesday, July 13 at 4:55PM.

Follow Continuum Analytics on Twitter @ContinuumIO and the #MITCDOIQ #AnacondaCrew hashtags to stay up-to-date on all our activity during the conference. See you there!

title: SciPy
subtitle: July 11 - 17 | Austin
summary:
Continuum Analytics is sponsoring SciPy 2016 in our hometown of Austin, Texas. Come join us at the 15th annual SciPy Conference for Data Science, Python, Open Source and more! 

We're hosting a Happy Hour event at our Austin HQ for everyone attending SciPy! RSVP for the event here, and come chat with our team on all things Open Source & Python.

title: PyData Paris
subtitle: June 14 - 15 | Paris
summary:
Continuum is the founding sponsor of PyData Conferences, and we’re proud to have a presence at these important open source conferences all over the world. Our team looks forward to seeing our #AnacondaCrew in Paris and talking all things Python, data science and open source.

Follow @ContinuumIO @PyData and the #PyData hashtag for updates!

title: MinneAnalytics Big Data Tech
subtitle: June 7 | Bloomington
summary:
Kristopher Overholt will present his talk 'Unlocking the True Value of Hadoop with Open Data Science,' and Ian Stokes-Rees will lead a hands-on training of 'Anaconda Python for Data Science' on June 7 at MinneAnalytics. 

Follow Continuum Analytics on Twitter @ContinuumIO and the #BigDataTech #AnacondaCrew hashtags to stay up-to-date on all our activity during the conference. See you there!

title: Spark Summit
subtitle: June 6 - 8 | San Francisco
summary:
Software Developer Siu Kwan Lam and Data Scientist Daniel Rodriguez will present talks at Spark Summit 2016. Siu will discuss GPU Computing with Apache Spark and Python on Tuesday, June 7 at 4:15PM, and Daniel will present Connecting Python to the Spark Ecosystem on Wednesday, June 8 at 11:15AM. 

Follow @ContinuumIO and the #SparkSummit #AnacondaCrew hashtags for event updates!

title: Big Techday 9
subtitle: June 3 | Munich
summary:
Kristopher Overholt will present his talk 'Unlocking the True Value of Big Data with Open Data Science' at 4:15PM on June 3 at Big Techday 9. See his full talk abstract here. 

Follow Continuum Analytics on Twitter @ContinuumIO and the #BigTechday9 #AnacondaCrew hashtags to stay up-to-date on all our activity during the conference. See you there!

title: PyCon
subtitle: May 28 - June 5 | Portland
summary:
Don't miss the tutorial 'PyData 101: Essential Data Science Skills for Every Programmer, From Data to Model to Visualization' from Data Scientist Christine Doig and CTO of Fashion Metric, Andy Terrel on Saturday May 28 at 9AM CST. 

Follow @ContinuumIO and the #PyCon #AnacondaCrew hashtags to stay up-to-date on all our activity during the conference.

title: PyData Berlin
subtitle: May 20 - 21 | Berlin
summary:
Continuum is the founding sponsor of PyData Conferences and we’re proud to have a presence at these important open source conferences all over the world. Our team looks forward to seeing our #AnacondaCrew in Berlin and talking all things Python, data science, and open source.

title: Open Data Science Conference East
subtitle: May 20 - 22 | Boston
summary:
Continuum CTO and Co-Founder Peter Wang will be presenting his talk, 'Interactive Viz of a Billion Points with Bokeh Datashader' and Dask core developer Matt Rocklin will present 'Parallelizing Data Science in Python with Dask' at ODSC Boston this year. 

Follow @ContinuumIO @odsc and the #ODSC hashtag for updates!

title: SciPy Latin America
subtitle: May 16 - 20 | Florianópolis
summary:
Carlos Cordoba, Spyder core developer, presents 'What's New in Spyder 3.0' May 18 at 2:20PM, and Bryan Van de Ven, Bokeh core developer, will discuss 'Interactive Data Visualization in the Browser with Bokeh' May 20 at 9:40AM at this year's SciPy Latin America conference. 

Follow @ContinuumIO @SciPyLA and the #SciPyLA2016 hashtag for updates!
